source
******


Description
===========

LogAnalyticsSource


Available Commands
==================

* delete-source

* get-column-names

* get-source

* get-source-summary

* list-meta-source-types

* list-source-extfield-defs

* list-source-functions

* list-source-label-operators

* list-source-patterns

* list-sources

* upsert-source

* validate-source

* validate-source-extfield-details
